listitem.simpara: Various unused Python 2 modules has been removed from the Debian packages (54706).

The server password change mechanism has been adjusted to first validate that the new machine password successfully replicated in OpenLDAP before finally changing the password locally in Samba/AD. Quickly reverting password changes in AD easily breaks DRS replication, so prevent this situation from happening (53205).

listitem.simpara: Remove left-over static host configuration for 127.0.1.1 (49042).
Adapted the code due to a Linux kernel API change in v5.7-rc1~128, where open(O_EXCL) now returns EEXIST instead of EISDIR (54476).
The remaining scripts have all been migrated to Python 3 (54208).

The Python-API of &ucsUCR; has been extended to offer a method get_int(), that can be used to avoid receiving a string, when an integer is required. If the value of the requested &ucsUCRV; is not a number, the default value is returned verbatim instead (20933).
The &ucsUCR; template for the file /etc/hosts now always produces the same output given the same configuration (54558).
Clarified the description of the &ucsUCRV; logrotate/rotate/count (54691).
The ppolicy overlay module uses embedded Python. This has been migrated to Python 3 (54582).

The behavior of the translog overlay was modified to skip grandchildren of the cn=temporary,cn=univention container. This new behavior can be controlled by the &ucsUCRV; ldap/translog-ignore-temporary. This reduces the number of replication transactions during creation of users and groups significantly. As a result it increases the replication performance and reduces the rate at which the cn=translog LMDB backend database gets filled. This variable is applicable only to the &ucsPrimaryDN;. The package univention-ldap-server activates this variable by default (48626).
An error when deactivating a listener module through UCR has been fixed (54696).
univention-translog import --min TID had no effect (54794).
Several memory issues have been fixed (49868).

The Notifier sometimes failed to process all transaction in bulk and aborted. This lead to the Notifier making no progress and filling the log file with the same error messages again and again. Transactions are now processes incrementally (49868).
If the number of transactions was lower than 1000, only a partial number of transactions has been imported during the join of a backup (54203).

The &ucsUCRV; dns/timeout-start is now also considered in the systemd unit univention-bind-ldap. This can be used in cases where a large number of DNS zones slows down the start of the DNS server bind. This only affects systems which have dns/backend set to ldap. i.e. systems that are not configured as Samba/AD DC. After changing the variable, running systemctl daemon-reload once is required (54108).
The unused method get_configuration() has been removed from the ListenerModuleConfiguration class in the univention.listener.handler_configuration module (54501).
A new widget suggesting mail domains while typing has been introduced (54467).
The logic for mapping UDM syntax classes to UMC frontend widgets and to get the dynamic choices for a UDM syntax have been moved into the UDM syntax classes (38762).
The domain component in an LDAP path is not shown in wrong reversed order anymore (53678).
In case of a long-lasting login, certain UMC modules do not work properly. If this happens, a message will be displayed to the user containing a link to (54032).
A new method has been added to generate and set a service specific password for a user (54438).
The UDM REST API now supports UDM object types containing - in their name (54063).
The entryUUID and dn of newly created objects are now included in the response (54347).
The UDM REST API now supports multiprocessing via the &ucsUCRV; directory/manager/rest/processes. Further details can be found in the performance guide (50050).
The Portal server now fetches user information from the UMC server asynchronously (53853).
Fixed various accessibility issues (54556).
Fixed various CSS issues (54556).
Added new tooltips. They comply with accessibility requirements (54556).
Improved the translation widget when editing portal entries (54556).
Fixed drag and drop behavior when using the keyboard, added screen reader support (54556).
The portal now integrates the self service functionality: Reset passwords, change profile, verify accounts, etc is now possible from within the portal (54556).
The French translation of UDM portal attributes has been updated (54029).
Some requests have been excluded from apache2/force_https, so that the portal tiles in the UMC are shown even if https is forced (53296).
The Portal server now provides a navigation endpoint (54618).
Keywords can now be added to portal entries. They are not visible, but searchable (54295).
Entries can now be opened in new tabs with a specific internal name ("target") (54633).
The function DNSanitizer has been added to the Python module variable __all__ to prevent warnings for developers (52445).
The cookie attribute SameSite can now be set for UMC cookies via the &ucsUCRV; umc/http/cookie/samesite (54484).
univention-management-console-dev now depends on both imagemagick and inkscape (54043).
The reason why servers are excluded from the app-installation drop-down menu is displayed again (54460).
Change order and prioritize App specific settings over App Center settings when populating the environment file. This is required for some upcoming Apps to be installed (54612).
Allow for the tmpfs that are created for a docker app to be defined in the apps ini file (54562).
A race condition was fixed, that caused apps to lose their installation status (54452).
Validate the form when choosing the installation host (53523).
Make the check regarding network conflicts with docker more robust (54082).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: The mapping of syntax class to UMC widgets via the &ucsUCRV; directory/manager/web/widget/.* has been removed. This can now be achieved via syntax classes directly (54840).
An error introduced in 335 has been repaired which caused that e.g. the selection list of printer model in the printer shares module could not be fetched (54849).
The error handling of the syntax class jpegPhoto was broken since UCS 5.0-0 and has been repaired (54769).
Clarified error message for invalid host name or FQDN (54663).
The available mail domains are now suggested when entering values for the attribute mailPrimaryAddress of objects users/user (54467).
Syntax classes can now depend on another UDM property and restrict their choices based on that (53843).
The logic for mapping UDM syntax classes to UMC frontend widgets and to get the dynamic choices for a UDM syntax have been moved into the UDM syntax classes (38762).
A crash while accessing an user with multiple user certificates has been repaired (54617).
Changing the case of the name or email attributes will no longer be prevented by the locking mechanism (52760).
Some redundant log messages logging password hashes were removed (54348).
The performance of the license check has been improved to reduce the initial login time (52292).
Backend functionality for service specific passwords has been added. It cannot be used via CLI (54438).
When removing a policy the policy is removed from the referencing objects (16966).
Searching with patterns containing umlauts is possible again (53975).
It is now possible to search for the user expiry date of users/user objects (54150).
Two resource sharing conflicts on Python dictionaries have been fixed, that could lead to tracebacks when modules are reloaded in a multi-threaded context (53581).
Moving of users/ldap objects is possible again. This was broken due to the Python 3 migration in UCS 5.0 (54085).
When user templates were members of groups an error was raised which prevented opening or modifying that group. Templates as group members are now ignored in UDM module groups/group (54402).

When setting an user as a member of a group in UDM, that had the same UID but a different DN of another member, the related attribute memberUid of the group got dropped. This happened in the cool Solution user-group-sync during move operations (54297).
The French translation of UDM extended attributes has been updated (54029).
The entryUUID of an LDAP object is now exposed by the UDM API (54883).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: The package univention-system-setup has been migrated to Python 3 (51318).
When executing join scripts via UMC module Domain Join the progress bar will now display the name of the currently running script instead of the last script that was finished (33255).
The joinscript of univention-samba4 did pass the credentials in clear text to other tools like ldbsearch as command line arguments. To reduce the attack surface it now uses a file instead (53100).

Joining a backup node into a single server UCS@school environment failed because the LDB module univention_samaccountname_ldap_check attempted to create an object of type computers/windows for it which always failed because the account name was already taken by the computers/domaincontroller_backup object (54768).
Several memory and open file descriptor leaks have been fixed. An error restarting Samba during package installation has been fixed. The build system for the package has been cleaned up (48823).

The script univention-directory-reports now offers two new options: The option --output-dir allows specification of the output directory and --output-name allows to specify the file name of the report (54153).
A new diagnostic plugin has been added to detect cases where the group membership attributes uniqueMember and memberUid are no longer consistent (48652).
52_mail_acl_sync will no longer fail if multiple IMAP mail folders exist (54675).
A new diagnostic plugin has been added to detect cases where an LDAP schema is missing that is actually still referenced by some objects (53455).
The script univention-run-diagnostic-check now displays links in the description of failed tests (50756).
Disk usage checks will now handle log level evaluations of &ucsUCRV; ldap/debug/level correctly (49354).
A diagnostic warning for the Samba replication status will now be formatted properly (53341).
Mounted ISO images are no longer included in the disk usage diagnostic plugin (49353).
The Python 3 compatibility when handling exceptions in certain diagnostic plugins has been corrected (53306).
A diagnostic module has been added to check the &ucsUCRV; notifier/protocol/version (54264).
univention-run-diagnostic-checks now offers to run a group of tests and also to exclude some of the tests (53969).
The script univention-run-diagnostic-check is now executed with machine account credentials by default (54515).
The detection of slapschema error message has been improved in 62_check_slapschema (54681).
Setting quotas for accounts with a fully numeric username has been fixed (54638).
Syntax classes can now depend on another UDM property and restrict their choices based on that (53843).
The logic for mapping UDM syntax classes to UMC frontend widgets and to get the dynamic choices for a UDM syntax have been moved into the UDM syntax classes (38762).
A UMC operation set enabling the creation of UDM Reports was added (54109).
Byte values are now correctly decoded for the labels of choices delivered by the syntax class LDAP_Search (54190).
The domain component in a LDAP path is not shown in wrong reversed order anymore (53678).

The &ucsUCRV; directory/manager/web/modules/users/user/wizard/property/ invite/default will now work properly and can be used to activate the invite user via e-mail option in the user wizard by default (54316).
Detecting UMC specific files did not work for packages having files, which have blanks in their filenames. This lead to error messages during package upgrades and inconsistent cache behavior (54047).
UCSVersion not includes the erroneous input parameter is included in the error message for debugging (49061).
Added the new function generate_password that can generate random passwords. The new function password_config can be used to get parameters for that from UCR (54555).
Changing a user password is now possible again when the referenced password history policy did not define values for password length or history length (51354).

For Python-ldap-3.3.0 (and higher) some TLS settings are no longer immediately materialized. To ensure correct behavior of TLS encrypted LDAP connections, the option OPT_X_TLS_NEWCTX will be necessary for future UCS versions (54408).
univention-upgrade --updateto is parsed earlier and exits on wrong parameter (49061).
apt-get --force-yes option is deprecated and has been replaced with --allow-unauthenticated --allow-downgrades --allow-remove-essential --allow-change-held-packages (48891).
App updates invoked by univention-upgrade will now work correctly (53666).
During the upgrade to UCS 5.0-1 PostgreSQL 11 might have been disabled by setting the &ucsUCRV; postgres11/autostart=no by accident (54255).
The script migrate_container_MountPoints_to_v2_config is deprecated since UCS 4.3 and has been removed (52539).
The package univention-docker-container-mode is deprecated since UCS 4.3 and has been replaced by an empty transitional package (52539).

The cookie attributes Secure and SameSite can now be set for the session and language cookies of SAML Identity Providers via &ucsUCRV; saml/idp/session-cookie/secure, saml/idp/session-cookie/samesite, saml/idp/language-cookie/secure and saml/idp/language-cookie/samesite (54483).
The link to the self service has been changed to point to the new portal based self service (54556).
An internal ID has been fixed, which caused the German translation not being shown when new passwords did not match (54268).
The French translation of UDM extended attributes has been updated (54029).
The logic for mapping UDM syntax classes to UMC frontend widgets and to get the dynamic choices for a UDM syntax have been moved into the UDM syntax classes (38762).
The Self Service now adds its dedicated portal to make use of the new features in Univention Portal. For more, see (54556).
A new backend function has been added that can set service specific passwords for a user (54434).

The e-mail template for password reset tokens now support additional placeholders for the properties title, initials, displayName, firstname, lastname, mailPrimaryAddress, employeeNumber and organisation (48960).
The package has been migrated to Python 3. Custom plugins for sending the password recovery tokens also need to be migrated to Python 3 (51327 54466).
The French translation of UDM extended attributes and portal attributes has been updated (54029).
The French translation of UDM extended attributes has been updated (54029).
A bug where antivirus signatures could not get updated properly on fresh installations has been fixed (54070).
The French translation of UDM extended attributes has been updated (54029).
Error handling in the script /usr/share/univention-mail-postfix/listfilter.py has been repaired (54560).

A new monitoring system has been implemented based on Prometheus, Prometheus Alertmanager and Grafana. During the upgrade all current Nagios services are migrated to Monitoring alerts (54748, 54749, 54750).
The configuration of NRPE plugin definitions was broken due to the migration to Python 3 and has been repaired (53681).
The Nagios plugins in univention-nagios-client have been converted to Python 3 (52258).
Apache can now be configured to only support TLS v1.3 connections by setting the &ucsUCRV; ucr set apache2/ssl/tlsv13=true (54306).

The RADIUS server can now assign VLAN IDs to user connections if their group has set the attribute vlanId. The &ucsUCRV; freeradius/vlan-id has been added to set a VLAN ID even if the user is no member of any such group (25916).
A new &ucsUCRV; radius/use-service-specific-passwords. has been added: If enabled, the authentication is done against a RADIUS specific password, not the domain password of the user (54409).
An error while adding the French translation to an extended attribute during the package update has been fixed (54461).
The French translation of UDM extended attributes has been updated (54029).
Updating an old RADIUS installation will now correctly update the description for the extended attributes networkAccessGroups and NetworkAccessComputers (54341).
The package univention-squid has been migrated to Python 3 (53357).
The Kerberos ticket lifetime was made configurable via &ucsUCRV; kerberos/defaults/ticket-lifetime (52987).
Some web browsers refused wildcard certificates generated by univention-certificates because the information was only stored in common name but required in subject alternative names, too (53288).
Add UCR packages to profile for network installation (54259).
Samba has been updated to version 4.16.2 (54682).

In some cases, in UCS@school the log.smbd filled with a message because a Windows 10 client attempted to access user files, which is denied by the NTACLs. While the origin of that behavior is still unknown, no negative side effects are known. To avoid overflowing the log file, we adjusted the log message to only start appearing at the debug level 2. Default log level is 1 (52979).
samba-tool now supports passing credentials using the option --authentication-file and the machine password using the option --machinepass-file (53101).
The share configuration of vfs objects, write list, hosts allow and hosts deny was broken because of too excessive escaping of quotes and has been repaired (49842).
The share setting map acl inherit = yes has been broken since UCS 5.0-0 and is not working properly again (54688).
The access to home shares via NTLM authentication on &ucsMember; has been fixed (54200).
The joinscript of univention-samba4 did pass the credentials in clear text to other tools like ldbsearch as command line arguments. To reduce the attack surface it now uses a file instead (53100).
During a server password change the Samba process was not restarted in some cases. The script to restart Samba was fixed to ensure the service is restarted successfully (54356).
The Kerberos ticket lifetime was made configurable via &ucsUCRV; kerberos/defaults/ticket-lifetime (52987).
samba-tool now supports passing machine password using the option --machinepass-file (53101).
samba-tool now supports passing credentials using the options -A|--authentication-file (53101).
Performing an Active Directory takeover will work when the original AD contains Group Policy Objects that use non ASCII encoding (54196).
Invalid (empty) UCR network interface configuration lead to network failure during AD Takeover (54359).
On systems updated from UCS 4.4 the AD-Takeover could abort with a traceback because the systemctl command was not found under the path specified in the Python code (54238).
The user expiry was off by one day between UCS and Samba. This discrepancy has been removed (53012).

For Python-ldap-3.3.0 (and higher) some TLS settings are no longer immediately materialized. To ensure correct behavior of TLS encrypted LDAP connections, the option OPT_X_TLS_NEWCTX will be necessary for future UCS versions (54408).
Improve message consistency between the man page and the --help messages (54588).
Fix spelling mistake of rsync in doc/univention-ssh.8 (54588).
Update the univention-scp --help and univention-rsync message to specify that the --no-split option must be set before the password file parameter (54588).
Added support for RFC6265bis SameSite cookie attribute (54483).
Fixed Python 2 compatibility of UCR template slapd.conf.d/65admingrp-user-passwordreset introduced by 308 (54790).
The start of OpenLDAP could fail if the ACL lines got too long. This could happen if the &ucsUCRV; ldap/acl/user/passwordreset/.* have a lot of values (54744).

The group membership cache now returns an empty list instead of None when requesting non-existing keys. This fixes a traceback in the Microsoft 365 connector listener, when not every ADConnectionAlias has at least one user (54572).
The French translation of UDM extended attributes has been updated (54029).
A new attribute univentionRadiusPassword has been added to the user class (54395).
The French translation of UDM extended attributes has been updated (54029).

A new &ucsUCRV; ldap/translog-ignore-temporary has been created to control if UDM temporary objects should be considered for replication by the OpenLDAP translog overlay which feeds the Listener/Notifier. This reduces the number of replication transactions during creation of users and groups significantly. As a result it increases the replication performance and reduces the rate at which the cn=translog LMDB backend database gets filled. This variable is applicable only to the &ucsPrimaryDN;. By default is will be set to yes during package installation and update (48626).

A new LDAP attribute has been introduced with 100. As re-indexing is time consuming the decision was made to delay the indexing until 5.0-2 and not to do it via an errata update. Therefore, a manual fix for customers is available and the required steps are documented at (54092).

The French translation package has been given a comprehensive update to align it to the current source code. All missing translation strings have been added and all outdated ones updated along with some general improvements of existing translation strings (54029).
Bugs in the localization template files were updated to fix the creation and update process of language packages (54029).
